title: Prismatic Lacewing
summaries: The Prismatic Lacewing is a rare flying critter that spawns in the surface Hallow from dusk until midnight after Plantera has been defeated. When killed by a player, it summons the Empress of Light; death from non-player sources other than Fallen Stars will not result in summoning.

The Prismatic Lacewing can be caught with a Bug Net. Releasing it from the inventory (with ⚒ Use / Attack) and killing it will still summon the Empress of Light (though it will quickly disappear if released outside of the Hallow). Only one Lacewing can be naturally spawned at a time. Because it can only spawn between dusk and midnight, its spawn is limited to between the times of 7:30 PM and 12:00 AM. It can also be used to craft a Prismatic Lacewing Jar.
It is one of the few entities that can be detected by the Lifeform Analyzer or its upgrades.

statistics.Tooltip: 'Its wings are so delicate, you must be careful not to damage it...'
statistics.Sell: 5
